disable_default_nav.label: Disable default navigation
disable_default_nav.comment: If using EM MegaMenuPro, default catalog navigation should be disabled. If EM MageMenuPro isn't install, default catalog navigation is always enable

freezed_top_menu.label: Freezed Top Menu
freezed_top_menu.comment: Make the horizontal menu on top while scrolling

disable_frontend_variation.label: Disable Variation block on frontend
disable_frontend_variation.comment: Display the variation module on frontend. For theme demonstration purpose.

disable_footer_links.label: Remove footer links
disable_footer_links.comment:
Remove the default Magento footer links: Site Map, Search Terms, Advanced Search, Orders and Returns, Contact Us
You can add your own footer links by create a static block, and insert new widget instance EM Static Block on to the Footer position.

disable_social.label: Disable Block Social On Details page

image_bgcolor.label: Background color of product image.
image_bgcolor.comment:
Specify background color of product image. If not specified white color is used by default. Storage Cache must be flushed in order to see its change.
Syntax: #number

page_bgfile.label: Upload Page Background Image
page_bgfile.comment: Upload your custom page background image instead of selecting above background pattern

page_bgposition.label: Page Background Position
page_bgposition.comment:
Property Values: left top, left center, left bottom,right top, right center, right bottom,center top,center center,center bottom,x% y%, xpos ypos, inherit
Default: 0 0

page_bgrepeat.label: Page Background Repeat
page_bgrepeat.comment:
Property Values: repeat, repeat-x, repeat-y, no-repeat, inherit
Default: repeat

google_fonts.label: Import Google Fonts
google_fonts.comment: Select which google fonts should be imported to your site. Hold SHIFT + left click a font to multiple select.

google_fonts_weights.label: Google Fonts' Weights
google_fonts_weights.comment: Google Font's weights to be imported to your site. i.e. 200,400,600,800

general_font.label: General Font
general_font.comment:
Font for body, content, text...
Default: 12px/1.35 Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif

h1_font.label: H1 Font
h1_font.comment:
Font of H1 element and other similar h1 heading.
Default: normal 22px/1.15 helvetica,arial,sans-serif

h2_font.label: H2 Font
h2_font.comment:
Font of H2 element and other similar h2 heading.
Default: normal 20px/1.25 helvetica,arial,sans-serif

h3_font.label: H3 Font
h3_font.comment:
Font of H3 element and other similar h3 heading.
Default: normal 18px/1.25 helvetica,arial,sans-serif

h4_font.label: H4 Font
h4_font.comment:
Font of H4 element and other similar h4 heading.
Default: normal 16px/1.35 helvetica,arial,sans-serif

h5_font.label: H5 Font
h5_font.comment:
Font of H5 element and other similar h5 heading.
Default: normal 14px/1.35 helvetica,arial,sans-serif

h6_font.label: H6 Font
h6_font.comment:
Font of H6 element and other similar h6 heading.
Default: normal 12px/1.35 helvetica,arial,sans-serif

box_shadow.label: Box Shadow
box_shadow.comment:
Configure box shadow for box, widgets, slider.
Default: none.
E.g. 0 0 2px #dadada

rounded_corner.label: Rounded Corner
rounded_corner.comment:
Configure rounded corner for box, widgets, slider.
Default: none.
E.g. 5px

top_header_text_color.label: Top Header Text Color
top_header_text_color.comment: Text color used in top header

header_bgposition.label: Background Position
header_bgposition.comment: Property Values: left top, left center, left bottom,right top, right center, right bottom,center top,center center,center bottom,x% y%, xpos ypos, inherit

header_bgrepeat.label: Background Repeat
header_bgrepeat.comment: Property Values: repeat, repeat-x, repeat-y, no-repeat, inherit

header_bgfile.label: Upload Background Header Image
header_bgfile.comment: Upload your custom page background image instead of selecting above background header

body_bgcolor2.label: Body Background Color 2
body_bgcolor2.comment:
Used in page title, block title...
Default: #f1f1f1

body_bgcolor3.label: Body Background Color 3
body_bgcolor3.comment:
Used in right title home background
Default: #69a204

body_bgcolor4.label: Body Background Color 4
body_bgcolor4.comment:
Used in label background
Default: #f40000

body_bgcolor5.label: Body Background Color 5
body_bgcolor5.comment:
Used in title checkout background
Default: #171313

body_bgposition.label: Body Background Position
body_bgposition.comment:
Property Values: left top, left center, left bottom,right top, right center, right bottom,center top,center center,center bottom,x% y%, xpos ypos, inherit
Default: 0 0

body_bgrepeat.label: Body Background Repeat
body_bgrepeat.comment: Property Values: repeat, repeat-x, repeat-y, no-repeat, inherit

body_bgfile.label: Upload Background Body Image
body_bgfile.comment: Upload your custom page background image instead of selecting above background body

body_text_color1.label: Text Body Color 1
body_text_color1.comment:
Used in tab title home,breadcrumbs, page title...
Default: #5d5d5d

body_text_color2.label: Text Body Color 2
body_text_color2.comment:
Used in my account, product name hover...
Default: #008bf4

body_text_color3.label: Text Body Color 3
body_text_color3.comment:
Used in table, checkout title...
Default: #7f7f7f

body_text_color4.label: Text Body Color 4
body_text_color4.comment:
Used in required text
Default: #ff0000

body_text_color5.label: Text Body Color 5
body_text_color5.comment:
Used in title block text...
Default: #ff7200

body_text_color6.label: Text Body Color 6
body_text_color6.comment:
Used in toolbar, title checkout
Default: #ffffff

body_link_color.label: Link Body Color
body_link_color.comment:
Link color used in Body
Default: #131313

body_line1.label: Line Color 1
body_line1.comment:
Line and border's color in input, col left, col right..
Syntax: #number or rgba(...)
Default: #c4c4c4

body_line2.label: Line Color 2
body_line2.comment:
Line and border's color in category
Syntax: #number or rgba(...)
Default: #eaeaea

body_line3.label: Line Color 3
body_line3.comment:
Border's color of hover image in shop by
Syntax: #number or rgba(...)
Default: #030303

footer_bgcolor1.label: Footer Background Color 2
footer_bgcolor1.comment:
Background color 2 used in Footer
Default: #f4f4f4

footer_bgposition.label: Footer Background Position
footer_bgposition.comment:
Property Values: left top, left center, left bottom,right top, right center, right bottom,center top,center center,center bottom,x% y%, xpos ypos, inherit
Default: 0 0

footer_bgrepeat.label: Footer Background Repeat
footer_bgrepeat.comment: Property Values: repeat, repeat-x, repeat-y, no-repeat, inherit

footer_bgfile.label: Upload Background Footer Image
footer_bgfile.comment: Upload your custom page background image instead of selecting above background footer

footer_line1.label: Footer Line Color
footer_line1.comment:
Line and border's color in footer
Syntax: #number or rgba(...)
Default: #dadada

additional_css_file.label: Additional CSS File(s)
additional_css_file.comment:
Add custom css file name.
File must locate in the same folder of theme.css (skin/frontend/em0075/default/css/). Multiple files separated by a comma (,).
File custom1.css and custom2.css are 2 examples provided in this theme. You can create your own file as well.
E.g.: custom1.css
E.g.: custom1.css,custom1plus.css

custom_css.label: Your Custom CSS
custom_css.comment: Add your custom CSS in addition to the Addition CSS File

alt_img.label: Alternative image
alt_img.comment: Image should be displayed when hover to the thumbnail image.

alt_img.label: Alternative image
alt_img.comment: Image should be displayed when hover to the thumbnail image.

viewmode.label: View mode
viewmode.comment: Set view mode in detail page: cloudzoom, lightbox, default

use_tabs.label: Enable Tabs
use_tabs.comment: Use tabs to display product collaterals

auto_close.label: Auto close
auto_close.comment: Specify the second for ajax cart to auto-close.

catalog_search_layer.label: Catalog search layer
catalog_search_layer.comment: This block is only showed at catalog search result page

wishlist_sidebar.label: Wishlist sidebar
wishlist_sidebar.comment: This block is only showed if user logged in.

reorder_sidebar.label: Reorder sidebar
reorder_sidebar.comment: This block is only showed if user logged in.
